p: Additionally, UnaProd was linked to plants with scientific names existing in CMAUP, a database covering a total of 5645 plants in medicinal, food, edible, agricultural, and garden plant classes. CMAUP also provides drug targets (ChEMBL target classes) and their activity levels, together with GO categories, KEGG categories, and ICD blocks for gene ontologies, biological pathways, and international classification of diseases, respectively.
